content: bamboo bush socks materials yarn fingering weight - cuff heel and toes color a solid 20 gram - bamboo shoots b and c solid or gradiant 30 gram each 60 gram in total - bamboo nodes d 15 gram color b and c must be contrasting colors color d must contrast heavily with colors b and c you can use various left over sock yarns - instead of one color b you can also use 2 or 3 different colors from the same color family - instead of one color c you can also use 2 or 3 different colors from the same color family needles in size us 1 / 2 25 mm and us 1½ / 2 5 mm stitchmarkers tapestry needle bamboo bush socks v2 @ysselin 2024 gauge 32 sts and 44 rounds = 10 cm / 4 inch sizing because of the small floats at the back the knitting is not very stretchy when in doubt choose a size larger then normal s 64 sts approx 19 / 7 5 inch foot circumference m 72 sts approx 21 5 / 8 5 inch foot circumference l 80 sts approx 24 / 9 5 inch foot circumference abbreviations st/sts stitch/stitches k knit p purl s slip purlwise k2tog knit 2 stitches together knitwise ssk slip 2 stitches individually as if to knit then knit slipped stitches together through the back loops ktb knit through the back loop r round m marker bor beginning of round sm slip marker pm place marker * repeat the instruction between the bamboo bush socks v2 @ysselin 2024 directions the cuff and toes are knit with us 1 / 2 25 mm needles the leg heel and foot are knit with us 1½ / 2 5 mm needles cuff with color a loosely cast on 64 72 80 sts with needle us1 / 2 25 mm i prefer the german cast on method but you can use any method you like join the sts to knit in the round r1 k2 p2 * until end of round r2 r15 as r1 leg the first bamboo shoot starts above stitch 4 this is the second purl stitch so slip 3 sts and place the bor-marker change to us 1½ / 2 5 mm needles note1 after the rounds with a bamboo node r7-r8 you can change the color of the bamboo shoot or you can use the same color again note2 knitting the socks inside out is strongly advised the floats will be much more even especially where the needle turns are made attach color b k4 attach color c k4 r1 r6 k4 with color b k4 with color c * until the bor-maker sm in the next 2 rounds the bamboo nodes are made attach color d r7 k4 with color d k4 with color c * until the bor-marker sm r8 p4 with color d k4 with color c * until the bor-marker sm in
